Earthfast Assault.name: Earthfast Assault
Earthfast Assault.flavor: Battering your foe mercilessly, you render it unable to move carefully.
Earthfast Assault.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Earthfast Assault.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. If the enemy moves before the end of your next turn, it grants combat advantage to you and your allies until the end of your next turn.
Earthfast Assault.weapon: If you’re wielding an axe or a hammer, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Press the Advantage (Earthfast Brigadier.name: Press the Advantage (Earthfast Brigadier)
Press the Advantage (Earthfast Brigadier.flavor: You know how to pressure an enemy so that its faltering is inevitable.
Press the Advantage (Earthfast Brigadier.effect: The target takes a penalty to its next saving throw equal to your Constitution modifier.

Stonechannel Strike.name: Stonechannel Strike
Stonechannel Strike.flavor: With this powerful strike, you can turn the tide of battle.
Stonechannel Strike.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and each ally within 5 squares of you regains hit points equal to 5 + your Constitution modifier.
Stonechannel Strike.weapon: If you’re wielding an axe or a hammer, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
Stonechannel Strike.effect: You and each ally who can see you regain the use of second wind.
